headline: Pinnacle Food Group Limited Appoints Dunruo Andrew Zhu  as President of Asia Pacific
summary: Vancouver, BC, July 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Pinnacle Food Group Limited (NASDAQ: PFAI) (“PFAI” or “the Company”), a leading innovator in the smart farming industry, is pleased to announce the appointment of Dunruo Andrew Zhu as President of Asia Pacific, effective immediately. With over 30 years of experience in commercial real estate and a proven track record of leadership, Mr. Zhu will spearhead the Company’s expansion strategy across the Asia Pacific region.
